The lack of political will to mediate the aggressor to put an end to the aggressor has led to a real situation we face today.
The territorial integrity of Azerbaijan now has the same value as the territorial integrity of Ukraine, which everyone speaks about.
If the Armenian-Azerbaijani conflict had been solved, perhaps Ukraine would not have faced this conflict now.
Why are these sanctions not against Armenia? They have done the same thing.
The Nagorno-Karabakh conflict will soon be resolved, as the dual standards policy is removed from the international agenda.
The first step is to start a part of the occupied territories by Armenia.
We will eliminate any potential risks associated with the start of military operations and we will begin to build trust.
Armenia ignores all our proposals. Because Armenia does not want peace.
A very clear signal is sent to the Armenian leadership: stop the occupation and start recapturing the occupied territories.
@kukuwazabanga good morning!
We are not against the principle of self-determination, but this principle should not violate the territorial integrity of the countries.
As in the case of Armenia, the territorial integrity of any country can not be changed by force.
So far, Armenia has not admitted to committing a military offense in Khojaly. They did not want any apologies.
Unlike Armenia, we voted for the territorial integrity of Ukraine in the UN General Assembly.
Because this country is not independent. They are unable to make decisions, and they always follow others.
What are the Armenian soldiers doing in the occupied territories? What is the Armenian soldier's job in Agdam?
They cause provocations, provokes us, and makes a lot of effort to push us down to tension (cont) http://t.co/ErRllYEUbM
They think that they can do everything they want and they will not be punished. This is the main reason.

Israel's existence is not subject to debate party, either in Israel or the United States. This does not mean that occasionally there will be no disagreement on the best way to ensure Israel's security

There were disputes between the prime ministers of Israel, left and right, and US presidents from both parties. No one has led to a rupture in relations. Our relations have been strengthened over the years

Israel has a serious dispute with the US administration and the other world powers on the Iranian proposal that would allow the regime (who declared his intention to destroy us) threaten the existence of Israel
This is not a personal dispute between me and President Obama, I very much appreciate the support of Israel in many areas and I am sure the President understands its obligation to ensure our security

I'll leave the United States not because I am looking for a confrontation with the US President, but that I must fulfill my duty to talk about threatens our existence. Talk in Congress that may affect the agreement

I must fulfill my obligation to speak up on a matter that affects the very survival of my country.
I intend to speak in the US Congress because Congress might have an important role on a nuclear deal with Iran.
I am going to the United States not because I seek a confrontation with the President, but to speak up for very survival of my country.
Iran is a regime that is openly committed to Israel's destruction.
We do have a profound disagreement today w / US Admin & P5 + 1 over the offer that has been made to Iran which threatens Israel's survival.

For the first time a government before even taking a vote of confidence is called to manage such a tough negotiation http://t.co/XlOlvOaTpG
A government that has even received a vote of confidence has gained an unprecedented degree of trust and acceptance in Greek society.
Tomorrow, the Eurogroup will be Greece. 10 million Greeks and Greeks who suffered unfairly for so many years.
Tomorrow at Eurogroup will be: 1.5 million unemployed 2.5 million poor 300,000 young people who migrated abroad.
These are what pulls us off the sleeve and they ask us, they demand not to go back with the head bent.
If we accept to continue from the point where the previous government stopped, it would be like accepting that the elections were not held
They have to understand that on Jan. 25 we did not have a simple government rotation. We had the end of a political regime.
In the coming days, it will be judged whether Europe can maintain its coherence and move ahead by changing.
In this crisis, small Greece plays a decisive role. It defends united Europe, democracy and solidarity.
We are the most pro-European partner. Willing to remain in a Europe fair and just for its peoples.
Those who bet on power and conflict will soon realize they are making a tragic mistake. Injured Europe.
In just a few days we managed to turn the issue of small Greece, not only on a European issue but on a global issue.
Within a few days, negotiations have never been made by previous governments since 2009.
We are not negotiating the memorandum. The memorandum was canceled by its own failure and of course by the vote of our people.
The new government negotiates the loan agreement.
Memoranda were the opportunity for the social state, health, education, public property to fall into the hands of the few.
The loan agreement we negotiate is not the memorandum. It is the agreement with the partners for financial support.
And the support was given to return back to the lenders. In order for the country to repay its debt obligations.
We are negotiating this agreement to stop being accompanied by punitive terms for the Greek people. Devastating for the economy
We are negotiating on the crucial issue of debt. The terms and procedures for repayment of debt.
The issue of debt is not a technical but a political problem. Debt relief is a political decision alone.
Those who choose the way of austerity do nothing more than recycle and giant debt.
What do we ask for in this negotiation. At first we ask for space & time. The bridge program is just that.
This short-term agreement will not contain austerity requirements. This is our red line.
Nor is it a new loan as disseminated by foreign media, representing specific interests.
We are asking for a return of 1.9 billion euros from the Central Bank, which is the profits of the central banks, that is, the money owed to us.
Really the other side what exactly is it asking for? I heard President Obama yesterday ask herself to Mrs. Merkel and not answer.
What exactly do they suggest? Let's take other loans. Take new austerity measures. Let us ignore the Greek people
Do not tell us again, here in the Greek Parliament, what Mr Syeble has wrongly suggested. We know these arguments.
So tell us something more original than raising the minimum wage will destroy the economy.
The gradual increase in the minimum wage to 751 will stimulate demand & growth. It will generate new revenue for insurance funds.
May I remind you that the state property you valued '10 at 50 billion & 14 in 5? We will not continue this course.
I have cleared it since Sunday. I repeat it today. We will not ask for an extension of the Memorandum.
We do not accept the prerequisites, the famous Troika, to complete the evaluation.
We claim the necessary write-down of Greek debt. Agreed at the Eurogroup since 2012, but never claimed
The agreement we propose will respect the rules. But above all, he will respect the Greek people and their choices.
If there was a loan shield until June, there would be no technical justification for threatening the ECB's funding cut-off.
In this version, we would simply apply the universal command, we would legislate our program without being extorted.
The only parenthesis that will exist in modern Greek democracy will be that of the monumental years. Ended January 25.
The State of Israel has been striving to expand its borders since the day it was founded, to completely eradicate the Palestinians from that geography.
I want to assure the Greek citizens that these programmatic statements will be implemented in their entirety.
The implementation of the government's programmatic statements do not constitute any kind of unilateral action.
The implementation of the program is foreseen under fiscal balance conditions and is not related to the need for new lending.
Israel must respect the establishment of an independent Palestinian state in which East Jerusalem is the capital city and must be drawn to pre-1967 borders.
We are optimistic with the mind and our will. Because our suggestions are those that can put an end to absurdity.
In 1953 Europe chose the way of understanding, solidarity and logic for the sake of Germany, but for the sake of the European idea
The European peoples who show their solidarity in Greece are the European idea in motion. It is the future of Europe
As long as Israel maintains its current stance, it will continue to be a cruel terrorist state that turns the region into a blood lake.
Together with the people, we can do everything. Thank you.
